body:
Comment 5: 
My program doesn't use cgo.

I just ran with GOMAXPROCS=1. It takes a much longer time to get the crash (after 76,000
requests are handled), and I see the crash when I send log output stderr (I think stderr
introduces some more timing issues that help see the crash). I've attached the log once
the crash occurred. The gdb out is shown inline below (note it is different). 

I'd also run w/ Debug=2 now and see if something jumps out / makes sense to me.

If not, I can package the built app and send to you privately along with the
dependencies so you can reproduce on your machines. What email address can I send it to?
Attachments: 1. stack-and-gdb-out-GOMAXPROCS-eq-1.txt (56204 bytes)
